summary: To obtain an administrative assistant position where I can apply my 10 years of customer service, gift of multitasking, and professional experience to provide a team with a high quality of consistent supportive experience.

experience.title: Library Educational Aide
experience.company: Green Valley Elementary and North Ridge Elementary
experience.description: Teaches students how to locate media in the library, empowers students to be responsible for their individual library needs; checks library accounts for staff, parents, and students; organizes books, keeps a clean workspace and processes daily shelving needs; assists in individual needs for the entire school; works in a library environment with emphasis on customer service and collaboration.

experience.title: Office Manager/ Program Director
experience.description: Managed operations for a martial arts school: implemented an in-house system to replace paid software, negotiated contracts for commercial accounts, set up new wholesale accounts, improved pricing, planned relocations and renovations, coordinated communications with students and parents, handled scheduling, events, recruitment, marketing, bookkeeping, and customer service; improved family and parent relations.

experience.title: Children's Ministry
experience.description: Created a warm and welcoming environment for children, staff and parents; led worship time, small group discussions, and all children's activities; helped maintain employees and volunteer schedules.

experience.title: Sales Associate
experience.description: Increased sales productivity and guest service by utilizing various communication methods; established an organized system for handling emails, faxes, and phone calls; learned essential business and management skills by using computer systems to handle site visits with clients and customers.

experience.title: Team Lead Specialist
experience.description: Managed electronics department; handled exchanges, returns, purchases, customer service, and complaints; built displays, inventory, back stock; led a team during peak and off-peak seasons; trained staff.
